title: Greg Miller and Colin Moriarty: The Made for TV Movie - A Conversation with Colin
description:
Clearly, Greg and Colin's story is one for the ages. Who should play them in the movie?

Today's topics were submitted by @Albinoasscheeck. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.
